title: This Video Explains The Lib Meltdown Over Elon (Ep 1740)
description:
In this episode, I address the meltdown at Twitter after Elon Musk purchased an enormous stake in the company. I also address the real reason that the left is panicking over this move. 

News Picks:


Did Hunter Biden try to profit off of the first Russian invasion of Ukraine?

Is Trump coming back to Twitter? 


The internet is splintering, and everyone is going to have to pick a side soon.

Disney shareholder tells the company to get back to work.


Three fake Republicans support the obviously unqualified Judge Jackson.


The BLM scandal gets even worse.
